channel.title: Issues to create an account
channel.description:
Hi, I had issues creating an account in this forum. Finally it seams that it is a problem with my email account. I had to create this fake account with a fake e-mail account to get in contact with you.
I have sent a couple of mails to johannes.taelman@gmail.com and I made a purchase, but I haven't get any mail. I don't know if you have received any of them.
How could we fix this issue?
Thanks in advance

item.title: Issues to create an account
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

Ive PM'd you for more details.

Read full topic

item.title: Issues to create an account

item.description:

Hi,
